mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_review ( c_num, r_id, cr_happy, cr_environment, cr_culture, cr_possibility, cr_heads, cr_comment, cr_writeday ) VALUES ( #{c_num}, #{r_id}, #{cr_happy}, #{cr_environment}, #{cr_culture}, #{cr_possibility}, #{cr_heads}, #{cr_comment}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company_review WHERE c_num = #{c_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE company_review SET cr_happy = #{cr_happy}, cr_environment = #{cr_environment}, cr_culture = #{cr_culture}, cr_possibility = #{cr_possibility}, cr_heads = #{cr_heads}, cr_comment = #{cr_comment}, cr_writeday = now() WHERE cr_num = #{cr_num}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company_review WHERE c_num = #{c_num} and r_id = #{r_id}
